item.title: Top conservative group reveals roadmap to rebuild new US immigration system 'from the ashes'

item.title: Elon Musk and Vivek Ramaswamy agree on 'need to scrutinize' US funding for NGOs
item.description: Elon Musk and Vivek Ramaswamy both declare that government funding of non-governmental organizations needs to be scrutinized.

item.title: Hunter Biden gun case terminated after pardon, but federal judge stops short of full dismissal
item.description: Judge Maryellen Noreika stopped short of dismissing the federal gun-charges case outright, as requested by Hunter Biden's legal team.
